table.name: civicrm_fpptaquickbooks_log
table.comment: Log relevant api calls for fpptaqb

field.name: created
field.title: Created Date
field.comment: When was the log entry created.

field.name: contact_id
field.title: Contact ID
field.comment: Contact who created this log entry; FK to civicrm_contact

field.name: unique_request_id
field.title: Unique Request ID
field.comment: Unique identifier for a single php invocation.

field.name: sync_session_id
field.title: Unique ID per sync session
field.comment: Unique ID per sync session, e.g. Step-thru sync page load or Scheduled Job run.

field.name: entity_id_param
field.title: Entity ID Param
field.comment: Name of api parameter identifying the relevant entity.

field.name: entity_id
field.title: Entity ID
field.comment: Foreign key to the referenced item.

field.name: api_entity
field.title: API entity
field.comment: API entity for the api call which triggered this log entry

field.name: api_action
field.title: API action
field.comment: API action for the api call which triggered this log entry

field.name: api_params
field.title: API parameters
field.comment: API parameters, as JSON, for the api call which triggered this log entry

field.name: api_output
field.title: API output
field.comment: API call ouptut, as JSON, for the api call which triggered this log entry

field.name: api_output_text
field.title: Text from API output
field.comment: Text or error message extracted from API call output

field.name: api_output_error_code
field.title: Error code from API output
field.comment: Error code, if any, extracted from API call output
